content: Delicious URL History SEO Tools By: Rand Fishkin March 15, 2006 The author's views are entirely their own (excluding the unlikely event of hypnosis) and may not always reflect the views of Moz. Table of Contents Copied! By: Rand Fishkin March 15, 2006 Delicious URL History SEO Tools The author's views are entirely their own (excluding the unlikely event of hypnosis) and may not always reflect the views of Moz. Del.icio.us has a new (or at least, new to me) URL history tool that tell you who's posted what about the site/page in the past and what they said about it. The history for SEOmoz is bland, but some others are more interesting (WARNING: The service is very slow): Note the generally positive reviews for Ask.com Love and Hate on Nielsen's Useit.com Massive amounts of comments on TechCrunch Folks seem to love Performancing And the reviews are not so positive for Microsoft.com You can use this service as a sort of look into what's been popular at a URL in the past, how it's heated up or cooled down in the eyes of the social taggers and even as a comment or reputation system. What do the deliciousers think of your sites? Post, too, if you find anything particularly compelling for any big sites. I'm thinking there's some fun dirt to be had if you dig deep enough. Copied! Back to Top
